Welcome to Guessing Game Project's documentation!
=================================================

This documentation contains what you need to
know the code of **Guessing Game** project.

`Bias Variance <https://biasvariance.ir>`_ is my
favorite website.

.. This is a
   multi line comment.

.. note::

   This is a very important note. you can also go to
   https://www.google.com/, and visit it

   You can go to the :class:`.player.Player` class.
